title: ERB 61206 Model S414 Class 2 Surveyor's Vest, Hi-Viz Lime, 5XL
description: ANSI Type R, Class 2 Surveyor's vest made of 100% polyester oxford. Zipper front closure. Vest has 12 pockets - 2 open interior waist pockets, left interior waist pen compartment, 4 divisional right chest pocket, exterior left chest double pocket - 1 open and 4 pen compartments. At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case. Mic tabs on both sides of vest. Meets ANSI/ISEA 107 - 2015.

Ideally created for Flagging Crews, Road Construction, Utility Crews, Survey Crews, Construction and Railway Workers. The Class 2 vest is made of 100 percent polyester woven oxford for a comfortable fit and durability. This multi pocket surveyors vest has 12 pockets offering you a wide Varity of carrying choices. With a zippered front to offer you a secure and comfortable fit. The Awarelite silver reflective stripes provide you with greater visibility in low light conditions. Conforms to ANSI/ISEA 107 standard for design, color and reflectivity.
